action.name: fss.misc_admin.restrict
action.title: Restrict general permissions
action.description: : Restrict the actions the user can take within the system. Leaving this as 'Not Allowed' will provide full access.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.ooo
action.title: MANAGE_OUT_OF_OFFICE
action.description: : Can manage other users out of office status.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.delete
action.title: Delete Tickets
action.description: : Can delete tickets.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.opennew
action.title: Open for user
action.description: : Can open new tickets for users.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.emails
action.title: Accept emails as tickets
action.description: : Can accept new emails as tickets, and access the 'EMails' tab.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.canned
action.title: Manage canned replis and signatures
action.description: : Can manage canned replies and signatures.

action.name: fss.misc_admin.listhandlers
action.title: Access 'List Handlers'
action.description: : Can access the list handlers section.

action.name: fss.ticket_admin.restrict
action.title: RESTRICT_TICKET_PERMISSIONS
action.description: : Restrict the actions the user can take on a ticket. Leaving this as 'Not Allowed' will provide full access.

action.name: fss.ticket_admin.reply
action.title: CAN_REPLY_TO_TICKET
action.description: : Can the handler reply to the ticket, if not then the 'Reply' button will not be present.

action.name: fss.ticket_admin.editticket
